parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Takes array of header indices as a parameter and removes headers with those indices. Indices of remaining headers will be recomputed.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> ctrl '''ctRemoveHeaders''' indices

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> indices: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctRemoveHeaders]] [0, 1, 2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
